about_the_game:
Welcome to Mini Golf Madness, a chaotic multiplayer mini-golf game where players select, build, and play the course! Whether you're a pro at sinking holes-in-one or just here for the laughs, Mini Golf Madness offers something for everyone.

Build, Play, and Dominate

In Mini Golf Madness, the action never stops. Players will select, build, and play courses , making every match a blend of strategy and skill. Compete by creating the most challenging courses while navigating through traps and obstacles designed by you and your opponents!

Key Features

  • Multiplayer Mayhem: Face off against friends or players worldwide in chaotic, fun-filled matches.

  • Dynamic Gameplay: Select, design, and play courses simultaneously for an ever-evolving and unpredictable experience.

  • Unique Challenges: Master tricky mechanics and overcome bizarre obstacles on courses created during gameplay.

What Makes It Madness?

Prepare for the unexpected! With physics-based gameplay and creative course designs happening in real-time, no two matches are ever the same. One moment you’re placing a devious trap, and the next, you’re dodging someone else’s cleverly placed obstacle.

Endless Replayability

With endless ways to build and play courses in real-time, Mini Golf Madness ensures every game feels fresh and exciting. Challenge your friends for the top spot on the scoreboard, or kick back and enjoy a laid-back game—the choice is yours.

Are you ready to tee off and embrace the madness?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
